passages.text:
Dead Cat::Hey there.  Been a while.

Jasper::What is he doing here?  Get him out of here!

[[No it hasn't.  It hasn't been long at all.  You never leave me alone!]]
[[Now is really not the best time.]]
[[Wait, am I stuck in a spectrograph?]]
[[p:I can go back, I can correct for it, I can fix it all!]]

links.name: No it hasn't.  It hasn't been long at all.  You never leave me alone!
links.link: No it hasn't.  It hasn't been long at all.  You never leave me alone!

links.name: Now is really not the best time.
links.link: Now is really not the best time.

links.name: Wait, am I stuck in a spectrograph?
links.link: Wait, am I stuck in a spectrograph?

links.name: p:I can go back, I can correct for it, I can fix it all!
links.link: p:I can go back, I can correct for it, I can fix it all!

passages.name: Untitled Passage

passages.text:
Dead Cat::I wouldn't have to keep showing up if you'd just get it together, Amelie.

[[C->Untitled Passage]]
passages.name: No it hasn't.  It hasn't been long at all.  You never leave me alone!

passages.text:
Dead Cat::"I need more time!"

Dead Cat::That's all you ever do: try to buy yourself a little more time.  "I'll do this for you, I'll make it happen, I just need a few more moments to get back up on my feet."  Yet you never get it together, do you?

Dead Cat::Let's face it, you were never going to be prepared for this.  So we should just jump in and get this over with.

Jasper::That scraggly rat is lying!  You were seconds away from getting your shit together.  

[[C->Untitled Passage]]
passages.name: Now is really not the best time.

passages.text:
Dead Cat::Trust me, anyone would have gotten that message loud and clear.  After what you did...

Jasper::Stop!  Stop!  Get her out of here!

Dead Cat::Ignore me. Grope me with a thousand hands and eyes.  Either way I'll keep on slinking through your inner recesses.

Jasper::No, don't buy it, she can be excised.  Like a bullet lodged within the brain.  Standard foreign body removal.

Dead Cat::Removing me will be a traumatic procedure.  Prepare yourself for a lot of psychic self-mutilation - I'm lodged pretty deep.

Jasper::Fine then, nothing beneath the cerebral cortex has been doing much for us lately anyway.  The lower stem just made us fucking walk manually, we don't need them.

Jasper::And right amygdala ablations are all the rage right now.

Jasper::Losing a little grey matter is a small price to pay for ridding your brain of vermin.

Jasper::So many parts of your brain are redundant.  Even that guy who took a rod through the skull eventually made a full recovery.  Cut her out!

Dead Cat::Huh, Jasper really doesn't like me, do they?

Jasper::That's just because I'm looking out for you. Your whole life is an ongoing tapestry of permanent, uncorrectable injustices - and this little furball is the root.  

[[C->p:Will you forgive me?]]
passages.name: Then I don't wanna play with you anymore!

passages.text:
Dead Cat::No, you cannot.  Your past stands forever as an uneraseable monument to spite and stupidity and lust.  

Dead Cat::You squander your youth and beauty, writhing, wailing, vainly trying to chisel that ugly marble into something it just isn't.

[[How can it be both too horrible to fathom and permanently uncorrectable?  That's not fair to me!]]
[[p:Will you forgive me?]]
[[p:Is it too late for me?->p:Will you forgive me?]]

links.name: How can it be both too horrible to fathom and permanently uncorrectable?  That's not fair to me!
links.link: How can it be both too horrible to fathom and permanently uncorrectable?  That's not fair to me!

links.name: p:Is it too late for me?

passages.name: p:I can go back, I can correct for it, I can fix it all!

passages.text:
Dead Cat::I see no reason why the laws of physics wouldn't permit both.  You can't comprehend it, but that doesn't mean it isn't possible.

Dead Cat::And The Powers That Be are not concerned if that is fair to you.

[[So there's nothing I can do?  Just wallow in pain and absurdity?]]

links.name: So there's nothing I can do?  Just wallow in pain and absurdity?
links.link: So there's nothing I can do?  Just wallow in pain and absurdity?

passages.name: How can it be both too horrible to fathom and permanently uncorrectable?  That's not fair to me!

passages.text:
Dead Cat::Don't sell yourself short.  You've been wallowing in a lot more than that: sewage, cancerous insulation, expired research chemicals.  Guilt.

Dead Cat::And yes, that's pretty much all you can do.  That's how time works.  Your distaste for reality is impotent.

[[C->p:I can go back, I can correct for it, I can fix it all!]]

links.name: C
links.link: p:I can go back, I can correct for it, I can fix it all!

passages.name: So there's nothing I can do?  Just wallow in pain and absurdity?

passages.text:
Dead Cat::Please cease these loaded, rhetorical questions.  We both know I'm in no condition to forgive you.

[[Then I don't wanna play with you anymore!]]
[[p:Then what am I supposed to do?  Someone, please, tell me what to do!]]
[[p:(Action) Just keep on thrashing and wallowing.]]

links.name: Then I don't wanna play with you anymore!
links.link: Then I don't wanna play with you anymore!

links.name: p:Then what am I supposed to do?  Someone, please, tell me what to do!
links.link: p:Then what am I supposed to do?  Someone, please, tell me what to do!

links.name: p:(Action) Just keep on thrashing and wallowing.
links.link: p:(Action) Just keep on thrashing and wallowing.

passages.name: p:Will you forgive me?

passages.text:
Dead Cat::Better than the one where you're naked in public, right?

Jasper::I hate to admit it but she's right, this is a lot more tolerable than that nightmare.  Better than the ones where your teeth start falling out too.

[[C->Untitled Passage]]
passages.name: Wait, am I stuck in a spectrograph?

passages.text:
Jasper::Yes, yes! That's the best course of action right now.  The only course of action, really.

Dead Cat::I must admit, that's awfully spirited thrashing

[[C->Light splash]]
passages.name: p:(Action) Just keep on thrashing and wallowing.

passages.text:
Dead Cat::Thrash about in mud and tar as a horrifying horse drags you down.

Dead Cat::Just kidding.  You probably should have seen a psycho-analytic specialist or something.  But instead you came here.

[[C->Light splash]]
passages.name: p:Then what am I supposed to do?  Someone, please, tell me what to do!

passages.text:
You feel a light splash hit your face.

And then another.

...

And then another.  

Jasper::Water torture?  If so, fitting.

Dead Cat::Looks like our time is once again coming to a close.

[[p:I'll figure this all out, make everything right.  Undo what was done.  I promise I'll succeed.]]

links.name: p:I'll figure this all out, make everything right.  Undo what was done.  I promise I'll succeed.
links.link: p:I'll figure this all out, make everything right.  Undo what was done.  I promise I'll succeed.

passages.name: Light splash

passages.text:
Dead Cat::Hahahaha.

Jasper::Ugh, her laugh, it hurts.

Dead Cat::You just don't get it, do you?

Dead Cat::You returned here.  You've already failed.
passages.name: p:I'll figure this all out, make everything right.  Undo what was done.  I promise I'll succeed.
